meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unable to be distinguished or differentiated from something else.
meanings.sent1: The indistinguishability of the twins made it hard for their friends to tell them apart.
meanings.sent2: The indistinguishability of the two brands of soda confused the taste testers.
meanings.sent3: The indistinguishability of the identical cupcakes led to a hilarious mix-up at the party.
meanings.sent4: In the dense fog, the indistinguishability of the trees made it feel like a mystical forest.
meanings.sent5: The indistinguishability of the fingerprints left by the culprit made solving the case a challenge.
